title: Help connecting to the client
body: Ever since the update to the client I haven't been able to play on my schools wifi. Can you help me out?

replies.body: That sounds strange because both client versions connect to the same login server.  Are you able to get in through the legacy client?  Let me know!

I can't log in on the old client either. I had to re-download to even get the old client. I really don't know what else to do. I've played at school before but after the update me and other friends I have on campus cannot login. I'm starting to think it is something on the schools side not you guys, and it just so happen to do that right around the time of the update.

Your best bet would be to hit up your school's IT to make sure a connection can be established.  They're pretty helpful with this stuff, so hopefully they can lend a hand.  You can also use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case of any local possibilities that are preventing access.  Hope it helps!
